name: Maddie's Advaned Learning! Full Game
description:
This is like the OG game, but the full one! Improved menus, AIs, and so much more! This includes:

-New NPCs

-New items

-An inventory system

-And more!

Controls

  • WASD - Walk
  • Mouse to turn around
  • Left-click - Pickup/interact
  • Space - Look behind

Check out the OG game here!

OG game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Inspired by Baldi's Basics.

Story:

Oh no! A friend of yours needs to get 9 scraps of his poem to practice and memorize cause tomorrow is his finale! The problem is, that he forgot to bring them home! Collect 9 scraps and join them to win! However, a teacher named Maddie will make it harder...

IF MAC SAYS "YOU DO NOT HAVE PERMISSION TO OPEN THIS APP" THEN UNCOMPRESS THE ZIP WITH KEKA!
